summary.p: The bearer of the letter, Mayor [Balthasar Funk] from Memmingen, is in search of a provisional head for the Memmingen school; [the people of Basel] direct him to Sebastian Guldibeck, and Grynäus requests support for his concern. Greetings.

div.p: The one who brings this letter to you, the Mayor of Memmingen, an excellent man, is seeking a deputy teacher for the school, which they are preparing with a bit more diligence. We will recommend Sebastian Guldibeck as suitable for this position. I beg you to also wish to promote the cause of Christ here. I add no more; I know your humanity and sincerity, my most beloved brother.
Greet all the brothers diligently, especially our Theodor. May Christ the Lord preserve us. Amen.
To the most distinguished man, Mr. Heinrich Bullinger, friend and brother. Zurich.
